Speed.description: How much speed this object will send you off with.

OutOfControl.description: How long the game locks your control for after coming in contact with this object.

KeepVelocityDistance.description: How long you keep your velocity gained from this object before gravity takes effect.

IsEventOn.description: Whether this object is must be triggered by something first, or is active/visible by default.

IsVisible.description: Whether this object is visible or not.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Extra.value: Springs with a propellar underneath, allowing them to gently float in the vast sky above.
